settings.promo_text: Description of promotion with lots of details.

settings.title: Make Your Gut Happy
settings.text: Anyone with a gluten intolerance knows how painful an unhappy gut can be. A gluten-free meal service can help you avoid meals that cause bloating or gastrointestinal discomfort.

settings.title: Better Energy & Focus
settings.text: If gluten leaves you feeling tired and foggy, a gluten-free meal service will dish up food that boosts energy and focus.

settings.title: Affordable & Convenient
settings.text: We know you're busy and don't have a lot of time to cook well-rounded meals. That’s why we’ve made our gluten-free meal delivery service affordable and convenient.

settings.section_heading: Why Choose a Gluten-Free Meal Kit?
settings.text: When you have a gluten allergy or sensitivity, preparing meals for the week can easily consume an entire Sunday. But when you order a gluten-free meal kit in Charlotte, you can reclaim your weekend. Other benefits of Charlotte gluten-free meal kits include:

Zero Gluten: There's no wheat, period. In fact, our gluten-free meals are prepared separately from other meals, so they won't touch the same surfaces or tools as meals with gluten. Our meals are safe and delicious.

Gourmet Creations: Each weekly menu is crafted by passionate and experienced chefs who care about your culinary experience. Unlike other meal subscription services, we don’t dish out boring flavors or heavy sauces.

Fresh Seasonal Flavors: We use seasonal produce so that our meals taste fresher and use fewer preservatives. In fact, our weekly menu is seasonally-driven, so meal options change regularly for more variety and flavor.

Delightful Pairings: We believe that each meal should be well-rounded and fully satisfying. That’s why our chefs curate a list of pairings to complement each meal. From appetizers to desserts, there’s something for everyone.

settings.heading: {{ collection.metafields.custom.second_heading.value }}
settings.heading2: What To Expect From Our Gluten-Free Meal Service
settings.text2: Charlotte residents love our gluten-free meals. Why? Because we make healthy foods that don’t sacrifice flavor.

settings.title: What is gluten?
settings.text: Gluten is a generic name for the proteins found in wheat, barley, and rye. It's a gluey ingredient that helps breads and other foods hold their shape. Pure gluten can be very sticky and rubbery.

settings.title: Should I avoid gluten even if I don't have an intolerance?
settings.text: Avoiding gluten is important for people who have conditions like celiac disease. However, many people claim to benefit from a gluten-free diet, even if they don't have a gluten intolerance. Note: Always consult with your doctor before making major changes to your diet.

settings.title: What will I get in my Table & Twine gluten-free meal?
settings.text: You’ll find pre-measured and pre-chopped ingredients that can be used to create a satisfying gluten-free meal in 15 minutes or less. You’ll also receive a QR that you can scan for heating instructions. Recipes are created each week, so every meal is exciting and flavorful.

settings.title: Are gluten-free meals healthier?
settings.text: Since Table & Twine’s gluten-free meals incorporate fresh, seasonal produce and lean proteins, they are very healthy. However, you should consult with your doctor to determine if a gluten-free diet is right for you.

settings.title: Can this meal plan be helpful for me?
settings.text: If you have a hard time planning nutritious and tasty meals, then Table & Twine’s gluten-free meal kits in Charlotte can help. We take the drudgery out of dinnertime, delivering a well-rounded yet delicious lineup of meals.

settings.heading: Heating Instructions
settings.text: Preparing an allergy-friendly meal by Table & Twine is simple! Just scan the QR code on your meal’s packaging for easy-to-follow heating instructions. These instructions are also available online.
